translation.en: [TV announcer 1] It's that special time of year, the holidays,
translation.ja: クリスマスがやってきます

translation.en: where we gather together with the people we love and eat so much food.
translation.ja: かぞく みんなでごちそうを たべましょう

translation.en: This is making me so hungry. Maybe there's something else on.
translation.ja: おなかがすくねチャンネル かえよう

translation.en: [TV announcer 2] It isn't a real holiday if you don't have tasty, delicious food.
translation.ja: ごちそうがないとお祝(いわ)いでは ありません

translation.en: [TV announcers 3, 4 and 5] Look at-- …all-- …this-- …tasty-- …food.
translation.ja: ごちそうが いっぱい！

translation.en: But, Moch, our ice is all we've got while the store's on holiday vacation.
translation.ja: でもね モチ今(いま)は こおりしかないの

translation.en: -Who could that be? -[murmurs] I don't know.
translation.ja: だれかな

translation.en: -[cell phone beeps] -Hi, Steve.
translation.ja: スティーブ

translation.en: Happy holidays, Waffles and Mochi!
translation.ja: お祝(いわ)いの日だねワッフルとモチ

translation.en: Check it out!
translation.ja: 見て

translation.en: I'm cooking up a batch of Steve's famous latkes over here for Hanukkah.
translation.ja: 特製(とくせい)のポテトパンケーキをつくってるよ

translation.en: How's your holiday going?
translation.ja: きみたちは？

translation.en: Uh, our holiday?
translation.ja: わたしたち？

translation.en: -[whispers] We don't have a holiday. -[murmurs]
translation.ja: なにもしてない

translation.en: What's your holiday called?
translation.ja: なにを祝(いわ)うの？

translation.en: -[both] Hm… -Oh, our holiday?
translation.ja: なんだろう

translation.en: Uh, it's called Free…
translation.ja: えっと　フリー… フリージーデーかな？

translation.en: Freezie Day?
translation.ja: フリージーデーかな？

translation.en: -Yeah. Huh? -[Steve] Freezie Day!
translation.ja: そう フリージーデー！

translation.en: I bet you two stellar chefs are cooking up a huge Freezie Day feast!
translation.ja: ２人で ごちそうをたくさん つくってるんだね

translation.en: Well, where do I even start? Hm…
translation.ja: じつは そうなの

translation.en: There's so much food. Too much, actually.
translation.ja: つくりすぎちゃった

translation.en: I wish you could come over and eat all this food.
translation.ja: たべてほしいくらい

translation.en: Really? You mean that? This is so exciting!
translation.ja: ほんとうに？　たのしみ！

translation.en: Uh, Steve?
translation.ja: スティーブ？

translation.en: [Waffles] Who could that be?
translation.ja: だれかな？

translation.en: Happy Freezie Day!
translation.ja: たべにきたよ！

translation.en: Now, where's all the tasty food?
translation.ja: ごちそうは どこだい？

translation.en: -How on earth did you even-- -Oh, you must be Waffles and Mochi!
translation.ja: なんで… ワッフルとモチね？

translation.en: -Huh? -I'm Broomhilda, Steve's partner.
translation.ja: わたしはブルームヒルダ

translation.en: He has told me all about the food that you have prepared for…
translation.ja: お祝(いわ)いするってスティーブに きいたわ

translation.en: Oh, what's it called?
translation.ja: なんのお祝(いわ)い？

translation.en: [chuckles] Freezie Day!
translation.ja: フリージーデー！

translation.en: Don't worry, Steve Jr., the food will be out soon.
translation.ja: 心配(しんぱい)しないですぐに たべられるわ

translation.en: -[whispers] Mochi, can I talk to you? -Uh-huh. [murmurs]
translation.ja: 話(はな)せる？

translation.en: Mochi, we don't have any food.
translation.ja: どうしよう？

translation.en: Freezie Day isn't a real holiday without food. What do we do, Moch?
translation.ja: ごちそうがないとお祝(いわ)いできない

translation.en: Yeah. You're right, Mochi.
translation.ja: そうだね

translation.en: If we give our guests a great big holiday feast, maybe we can make Freezie Day a real holiday!
translation.ja: ごちそうをつくればきょうが お祝(いわ)いの日になる

translation.en: Let's make this dinner happen.
translation.ja: さっそく はじめよう

translation.en: Take the Magicart and bring back holiday foods. -I'll keep them distracted. -[murmurs]
translation.ja: マジックカートでごちそうを さがしてきて

translation.en: But remember, you gotta be back before the sun goes down.
translation.ja: でも あかるいうちにもどってきてね

translation.en: It's a holiday, not a holi-night.
translation.ja: 夜(よる)は ねるじかんよ

translation.en: Let's go in three, two…
translation.ja: いくよ　さん　にい…

translation.en: -[Mochi murmurs] -…blast off!
translation.ja: しゅっぱつ！

translation.en: [kids] Waffles and Mochi's Holiday Feast.
translation.ja: ワッフルとモチの冬(ふゆ)のごちそう

translation.en: I've heard of a ton of holidays that happen around this time of year
translation.ja: “冬至(とうじ)”の季節(きせつ)はお祝(いわ)いが たくさんあるけど

translation.en: for winter solstice, but never Freezie Day!
translation.ja: “冬至(とうじ)”の季節(きせつ)はお祝(いわ)いが たくさんあるけど フリージーデーは はじめて

translation.en: What's winter solstice? It's the shortest day and the longest night of the year.
translation.ja: 冬至(とうじ)は１年でいちばん昼(ひる)が みじかい日だよ

translation.en: Let me explain.
translation.ja: 説明(せつめい)するね

translation.en: See the position of the Earth, how it's tilted while it orbits the sun?
translation.ja: 地球(ちきゅう)は 太陽(たいよう)にむかってかたむいてる

translation.en: That's what gives us seasons! So every year around December 21st,
translation.ja: だから季節(きせつ)が かわるんだ毎年(まいとし) 12月21日ごろは

translation.en: the position of the Earth means half of our planet experiences winter,
translation.ja: だから季節(きせつ)が かわるんだ毎年(まいとし) 12月21日ごろは １年で いちばん昼(ひる)が みじかくなるよ

translation.en: making it the shortest daytime of the year!
translation.ja: １年で いちばん昼(ひる)が みじかくなるよ

translation.en: But here's the coolest part.
translation.ja: でも はんたいに―

translation.en: When it's the shortest day of the year here, it's the longest day of the year here,
translation.ja: 地球(ちきゅう)のうらがわでは昼(ひる)が ながくなる

translation.en: AKA it's summer.
translation.ja: つまり夏(なつ)だ

translation.en: That's right. Down Under, Christmas is a summer holiday.
translation.ja: 地球(ちきゅう)の南(みなみ)がわでは12月は夏(なつ)なんだね

translation.en: So right now, it's summer and winter at the same time!
translation.ja: せかいには夏(なつ)と冬(ふゆ)のクリスマスがあるんだよ

translation.en: -[murmurs] -[Magicart] For thousands of years, civilizations around the world have celebrated winter solstice
translation.ja: せかいでは むかしから冬至(とうじ)の日を祝(いわ)って

translation.en: because the sun and seasons are so important to our food and lives.
translation.ja: 季節(きせつ)とたべものに感謝(かんしゃ)してきたんだ

translation.en: -[murmurs] -[Magicart] Right! Our mission.
translation.ja: そうだね

translation.en: You need to bring back food for a Freezie Day Feast before sundown,
translation.ja: ごちそうを さがさなきゃ

translation.en: and I know just the winter holiday for you.
translation.ja: ぴったりの お祝(いわ)いがあるよ

translation.en: Makahiki.
translation.ja: マカヒキだ

translation.en: [Magicart laughs] Yep, this is winter in Hawaii.
translation.ja: これはハワイの冬(ふゆ)

translation.en: Makahiki is an indigenous Hawaiian holiday feast that lasts…
translation.ja: ハワイの先住民(せんじゅうみん)はマカヒキを―

translation.en: wait for it… four months!
translation.ja: ４か月も祝(いわ)うんだ

translation.en: I know just the person for you to meet.
translation.ja: ともだちのキミが―

translation.en: My chef friend, Kimi Swimmy, knows all about Makahiki.
translation.ja: マカヒキについておしえてくれる

translation.en: -[Magicart] Aloha Hawaii! -[Mochi cheers]
translation.ja: こんにちは ハワイ！

translation.en: Okay, Mochi, aim for Kimi's boogie board!
translation.ja: キミのサーフボードにのろう

translation.en: -Who are you? -[murmurs] My name's Mochi!
translation.ja: あなたは？

translation.en: Hi, Mochi!
translation.ja: よろしく　モチ

translation.en: Oh, we're gonna go celebrate Makahiki today. I'm getting fish for it.
translation.ja: マカヒキのごちそうに魚(さかな)をとってるのよ

translation.en: [Kimi] There's a bunch of fish down there. We call them u'u,
translation.ja: ウウという魚(さかな)がたくさんいるの

translation.en: and they live in these dark caves at the bottom of the ocean.
translation.ja: 海(うみ)の底(そこ)の どうくつにすんでるわ

translation.en: And I have to hold my breath and go down,
translation.ja: わたしは どうくつまでもぐって

translation.en: and then that's when I'm able to take my spear and catch 'em.
translation.ja: モリで魚(さかな)を つかまえるのよ

translation.en: We always want these fish to be reproducing and growing
translation.ja: わたしたちの ねがいは 魚(さかな)がふえて海(うみ)がげんきになること

translation.en: and keeping our oceans healthy.
translation.ja: 魚(さかな)がふえて海(うみ)がげんきになること

translation.en: -I'm only taking what I need. -[Mochi] Wow!
translation.ja: とるのは必要(ひつよう)なぶんだけ

translation.en: We're gonna go fry these up for our Makahiki feast. Wanna come?
translation.ja: いっしょにごちそうを つくりたい？

translation.en: [Steve] A little higher.
translation.ja: もっと上

translation.en: -[grunts] -A little lower.
translation.ja: もっと下

translation.en: A little higher.
translation.ja: もっと上

translation.en: A little lower.
translation.ja: もっと下

translation.en: -[doorbell rings] -Come in!
translation.ja: どうぞ

translation.en: Happy Freezie Day!
translation.ja: フリージーデーよ

translation.en: We're hungry for fun!
translation.ja: たのしもう！

translation.en: I hope it's okay. I invited our friends from the store.
translation.ja: お店(みせ)のともだちをさそったんだ

translation.en: And we invited world-renowned chef Samin Nosrat.
translation.ja: サミンも さそったよ

translation.en: -What? -Happy Freezie Day!
translation.ja: えっ？ お祝(いわ)いね！

translation.en: It's okay. I'm good.
translation.ja: だいじょうぶよ

translation.en: Mochi, get home soon.
translation.ja: モチ　早く

translation.en: [Kimi] Welcome to my backyard.
translation.ja: わたしの庭(にわ)よ

translation.en: -Mochi, you gonna help me cook some fish? -[murmurs] Yeah!
translation.ja: 料理(りょうり)を てつだって

translation.en: So, a lot of times, people eat fish as fish fillets,
translation.ja: お店(みせ)で見かけるのは ほね も かわもないしかくに加工(かこう)された魚(さかな)よ

translation.en: where they're just in these rectangles and they don't have any skins or bones,
translation.ja: ほね も かわもないしかくに加工(かこう)された魚(さかな)よ

translation.en: but we cook them whole. So you're always gonna remember that it's a fish.
translation.ja: でも わたしたちは魚(さかな)のすがたのまま料理(りょうり)するの

translation.en: [Kimi] Mochi, while I finish up, why don't you help the kids make some poi?
translation.ja: 子どもたちがポイをつくってるわ

translation.en: Poi is mashed kalo that you pound with this kind of rock.
translation.ja: ポイはタロイモを石でつぶした料理(りょうり)なんだ

translation.en: [Kimi] Come eat, everybody.
translation.ja: めしあがれ

translation.en: Oh, wow! Everybody's hungry! [laughs]
translation.ja: みんな おなかすいた？

translation.en: [woman] So Makahiki is all about a change of season.
translation.ja: マカヒキは季節(きせつ)のへんかを祝(いわ)うものよ

translation.en: We celebrate the land's abundance to feed us.
translation.ja: たべものをそだてる大地(だいち)に感謝(かんしゃ)するの

translation.en: Hawaiians like to eat.
translation.ja: たべるのがすき

translation.en: Who doesn't like to eat?
translation.ja: みんな同(おな)じ

translation.en: There's just something really special about eating close to home
translation.ja: 家(いえ)の近(ちか)くで とれるものを 必要(ひつよう)なぶんだけ たべる

translation.en: and only taking what you need
translation.ja: 必要(ひつよう)なぶんだけ たべる

translation.en: because that's how you take care of your home.
translation.ja: そうやって島(しま)を守(まも)ってる

translation.en: There's a bite of fish if you want.
translation.ja: 魚(さかな)を たべてみて

translation.en: -[Mochi murmurs and purrs] -[Kimi] What do you think?
translation.ja: おいしい？

translation.en: That's really what we're celebrating when we celebrate Makahiki.
translation.ja: マカヒキで祝(いわ)うのは

translation.en: Food and the land and the community.
translation.ja: たべもの 大地(だいち)人とのつながり

translation.en: And that's worth celebrating, don't you think?
translation.ja: どれも大切(たいせつ)なこと

translation.en: [Kimi] That's right, Mochi.
translation.ja: そうよ モチ

translation.en: If you take care of the food, the food will take care of you.
translation.ja: たべものを大切(たいせつ)にしてるの

translation.en: Hey, Mochi, wanna play a game?
translation.ja: モチ あそぼう

translation.en: -[all chant] Go, Mochi! -[Mochi cheers]
translation.ja: がんばれ　がんばれ

translation.en: [woman] Here you go, Mochi. Now you're part of the ohana. That means family.
translation.ja: さあ どうぞこれで あなたも かぞくよ

translation.en: Ah no, who could that be?
translation.ja: こんどは だれ？

translation.en: Happy Freezie Day!
translation.ja: フリージーデー！

translation.en: Busy, you're here too?
translation.ja: ビジーもきたの？

translation.en: Well, I'm famished, but where's all the food?
translation.ja: おなかペコペコごちそうは？

translation.en: Hello, Steve. Hello, Samin.
translation.ja: やあ みんな

translation.en: So, Waffles, tell me all about your menu inspiration.
translation.ja: ワッフル どんな料理(りょうり)なの？

translation.en: I wanna know everything about this party.
translation.ja: ぜんぶ おしえて

translation.en: -Uh… -You must have been cooking for days!
translation.ja: 何日(なんにち)もかけてつくったんでしょ？

translation.en: Hey, everyone! Look what I found!
translation.ja: ねえ　みんな見て

translation.en: It's a snow cone maker!
translation.ja: かきごおりマシンだ！

translation.en: [gasps] No, Steve, don't flip the switch!
translation.ja: つけちゃダメよ

translation.en: Flipping the switch!
translation.ja: つけるよ！

translation.en: -[snowblower beeps] -That's our snowblower.
translation.ja: ゆきが出ちゃう

translation.en: Guys, I just need to turn this thing off quick. [grunts]
translation.ja: 早く とめなきゃ

translation.en: -[Waffles] I'm okay. -[doorbell rings]
translation.ja: だいじょうぶよ

translation.en: Hello!
translation.ja: こんにちは

translation.en: It's Tracee Ellis Ross!
translation.ja: トレイシーだ！

translation.en: -Hi, everyone! Hi! -Hi, Tracee!
translation.ja: みんな げんき？

translation.en: Shelfie invited me. We're in yoga class together.
translation.ja: シェルフィーにさそわれたの

translation.en: Did I miss Freezie Day?
translation.ja: もう おわり？

translation.en: Your timing, like your talent, is impeccable, Tracee. We're just about to eat snow cones.
translation.ja: これから かきごおりをつくるんだ

translation.en: Ooh, well, I can't say no cone to a snow cone.
translation.ja: まあ ワクワクしちゃう

translation.en: Help! Mochi!
translation.ja: たすけて　モチ

translation.en: -[horn honks] -Mochi, say aloha. We gotta jet!
translation.ja: いそいで かえろう

translation.en: Take as much poi as you need and anything else you want.
translation.ja: すきなだけポイを もっていって

translation.en: [all] Aloha, Mochi!
translation.ja: またね　モチ！

translation.en: [Waffles] I hope that's Mochi and the food.
translation.ja: モチかしら？

translation.en: -[gasps] Baker! -Hey!
translation.ja: ベーカー！

translation.en: Happy Freezie Day! Happy Freezie Day!
translation.ja: ハッピー フリージーデー

translation.en: Hey, guess what I brought?
translation.ja: なんだとおもう？

translation.en: Oh yes! Is that what I think it is?
translation.ja: それは もしかして？

translation.en: [baker] Our friends the Pupcakes, of course!
translation.ja: ワンケーキよ

translation.en: Oh, the Pupcakes. [chuckles nervously]
translation.ja: いらっしゃい

translation.en: Yay, even more mouths to feed. Cool.
translation.ja: たのしくなるね

translation.en: I knew you would be so happy.
translation.ja: あそんであげて

translation.en: [sighs] I think I better call Mochi.
translation.ja: モチに連絡(れんらく)よ

translation.en: Moch, where's the food?
translation.ja: ごちそうは？

translation.en: -Fresh Hawaiian poi? -[murmurs] Yeah.
translation.ja: ハワイのポイ？

translation.en: Well, that sounds like an amazing holiday food,
translation.ja: おいしそうだね

translation.en: but we have way more guests than we thought.
translation.ja: でも １つじゃ足りない

translation.en: We're gonna need even more food for our Freezie Day dinner.
translation.ja: もっと さがしてきて

translation.en: Well, since it's the winter solstice, we could go to Sweden for Saint Lucy's Day,
translation.ja: それならスウェーデンの聖(せい)ルシア祭(さい)や

translation.en: or we could go to Guatemala for Fiesta de Santo Tomás,
translation.ja: グアテマラの聖(せい)トーマス祭(さい)や

translation.en: or China for Dongzhi, or…
translation.ja: 中国(ちゅうごく)の冬至節(とうじせつ)…

translation.en: Wait! I know where we should go to top off your Freezie Day feast.
translation.ja: そうだ　ぴったりの国(くに)がある

translation.en: [screams] Norway!
translation.ja: ノルウェーだ！

translation.en: The Sámi people there celebrate Juovllat,
translation.ja: サーミ族(ぞく)はヨヴラットを祝(いわ)って

translation.en: a cozy holiday when families gather to sing
translation.ja: サーミ族(ぞく)はヨヴラットを祝(いわ)って かぞくで うたいごちそうをたべるよ

translation.en: and eat special foods they've saved all winter.
translation.ja: かぞくで うたいごちそうをたべるよ

translation.en: Let's go see my friend Maret in Norway. She's a reindeer herder.
translation.ja: トナカイを かってるともだちのマレが

translation.en: She can hook you up with food for your Freezie Day dinner.
translation.ja: ごちそうをわけてくれるかも

translation.en: Well, just get back with lots of food, okay? Before sundown. -Hurry, Moch! -[murmurs]
translation.ja: あかるいうちにごちそうを さがしてきて

translation.en: [Magicart] To Norway, Mochi! Hallo!
translation.ja: ノルウェーにしゅっぱつだ

translation.en: Landing in Norway! Brace for impact!
translation.ja: ノルウェーについたちゃくりくするよ

translation.en: [Maret] Sorry about that. That was my reindeer, Missy.
translation.ja: あれはトナカイのミッシーよ

translation.en: Today is the Juovllat.
translation.ja: きょうはヨヴラットなの

translation.en: You have to celebrate the Juovllat with us.
translation.ja: お祝(いわ)いしましょう

translation.en: Do you know how to drive the snowmobile?
translation.ja: スノーモービルに のれる？

translation.en: Let's go to get something to eat.
translation.ja: なにか たべましょう

translation.en: Do you like pancakes?
translation.ja: パンケーキは すき？

translation.en: For our holiday, Juovllat, we make Sami pancakes.
translation.ja: ヨヴラットのごちそうはサーミ流(りゅう)のパンケーキよ

translation.en: -Okta. -One.
translation.ja: 〈ひとつ〉

translation.en: -Guokte. -Two.
translation.ja: 〈ふたつ〉

translation.en: -Golbma. -Three.
translation.ja: 〈みっつ〉

translation.en: -Njeallje. -Four.
translation.ja: 〈よっつ〉

translation.en: -Vihtta. -Five.
translation.ja: 〈いつつ〉

translation.en: -[Maret] Get some sugar. -[murmurs]
translation.ja: おさとう

translation.en: -And some milk too. -[murmurs]
translation.ja: ぎゅうにゅう

translation.en: -Wheat flour. -[murmurs]
translation.ja: こむぎこ

translation.en: -You have some reindeer blood. -[Mochi] Oh!
translation.ja: トナカイの血(ち)

translation.en: [Maret] Sámi people eat reindeer because reindeer eat lichen under the snow
translation.ja: サーミ族(ぞく)はトナカイをたべることで

translation.en: which gives us vitamins we can't get in winter without them.
translation.ja: トナカイからビタミンを もらってる

translation.en: We take care of reindeer, and they take care of us.
translation.ja: トナカイを守(まも)り トナカイに守(まも)られてる

translation.en: [Waffles] Come on, Moch. Where are you?
translation.ja: モチ どこなの？

translation.en: Hey, Waffles, come listen to Samin.
translation.ja: サミンの話(はなし)をきこう

translation.en: In Iran, we have a holiday called Yalda.
translation.ja: イランにはヤルダーという―

translation.en: It's a winter celebration that dates back 2500 years.
translation.ja: 2500年まえからつづく冬(ふゆ)のお祝(いわ)いがあるの

translation.en: Let me show you. These are some of my favorite foods we eat.
translation.ja: これが ごちそうよ

translation.en: -There's watermelon. -Look delicious.
translation.ja: スイカもあるし

translation.en: [Samin] And pomegranates.\
translation.ja: ザクロもある

translation.en: All night long, Waffles, all we do is eat and eat and eat.
translation.ja: 夜(よる)おそくまでみんなで食事(しょくじ)をするの

translation.en: -Just like we're gonna do here tonight. -Yes!
translation.ja: きょうとおなじね

translation.en: Freezie Day will never be real without some food.
translation.ja: これじゃ お祝(いわ)いできない

translation.en: If you'll excuse me. [grunts]
translation.ja: ちょっと失礼(しつれい)

translation.en: -[Tracee] So cool. -[pants]
translation.ja: すてき

translation.en: -[Mochi murmurs] -Mochi, are you on your way?
translation.ja: モチ どこ？

translation.en: What? You are still in Norway?
translation.ja: まだノルウェーに？

translation.en: -[Pupcake barks] -[whispers] You're still in Norway?
translation.ja: どうなの？

translation.en: Oh, Mrs. O's calling. She'll know what to do.
translation.ja: オバマ夫人(ふじん)よ　きいてみる

translation.en: Happy Freezie Day, Waffles!
translation.ja: フリージーデーね！

translation.en: -What? How did you know? -Shelfie told me all about it.
translation.ja: しってるの？ シェルフィーにきいたわたのしんでる？

translation.en: How's the dinner?
translation.ja: シェルフィーにきいたわたのしんでる？

translation.en: Great. Except for the food.
translation.ja: ええ　でもごちそうがないの

translation.en: Look, can I tell you something, Waffles?
translation.ja: いいことを おしえてあげる

translation.en: Our Christmas turkey didn't go as planned either. I burned it.
translation.ja: わたしもクリスマスに料理(りょうり)を こがしちゃったの

translation.en: -You did? -Yeah, but that's okay.
translation.ja: ホント？ それでも たのしんだ

translation.en: We're having fun together.
translation.ja: それでも たのしんだ

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Oh, is that Mrs. O?
translation.ja: そうね オバマ夫人(ふじん)？

translation.en: -Happy Freezie Day! Mrs. O, everybody! -[Samin] Hi, Mrs. O!
translation.ja: フリージーデーをお祝(いわ)いしてるんだ

translation.en: You guys singing any good Freezie Day songs?
translation.ja: フリージーデーのうたは？

translation.en: [laughs] There are so many. I'd love to sing, but we don't have a piano.
translation.ja: うたは あるけどピアノがない

translation.en: Oh, I do.
translation.ja: あるわよ

translation.en: [strains] You have a piano?
translation.ja: もってきたの？

translation.en: [Busy] Of course she does. She's Tracee Ellis Ross! A true artiste.
translation.ja: もちろんさ　トレイシーは本物(ほんもの)のアーティストだ

translation.en: You're putting a lot of pressure on me, Busy.
translation.ja: うまくできるかしら

translation.en: Teach us a Freezie Day song, won't you, Waffles?
translation.ja: さあ うたをおしえて

translation.en: -[Busy] Yes, Waffles. -Uh… Ooh…
translation.ja: そうだよ

translation.en: Go, Waffles, go! Teach us a good song.
translation.ja: いいじゃないの　うたって

translation.en: -[piano plays] -Here goes nothing.
translation.ja: やってみる

translation.en: -♪ Today's the day we celebrate ♪ -Oh…
translation.ja: きょうは お祝(いわ)いの日

translation.en: ♪ There's dinner plates It's Freezie Day ♪
translation.ja: フリージーデーのごちそうよ

translation.en: -I love it! -Me too.
translation.ja: すてき ボクも

translation.en: ♪ And we will eat ♪
translation.ja: みんなで たべよう

translation.en: A feast?
translation.ja: ごちそう？

translation.en: -Yeah, we'll eat a traditional feast. -[Tracee] So sweet!
translation.ja: 伝統的(でんとうてき)なごちそうよ

translation.en: -♪ It's Freezie Day ♪ -♪ Freezie Day ♪
translation.ja: きょうはフリージーデー

translation.en: Oh! I love it!
translation.ja: いいね

translation.en: -[Shelfie] Yeah. -So good.
translation.ja: さいこうだ

translation.en: [sighs] Mochi, I'm counting on you, bud.
translation.ja: モチ 早くもどってきて

translation.en: [Maret] Our traditional place to cook is the lavvu.
translation.ja: 料理(りょうり)はラーボの中でつくるの

translation.en: -I'm making blood pancakes on the fire. -Oh…
translation.ja: 火でパンケーキをやいてる

translation.en: [Maret] And then we add the cloudberry jam.
translation.ja: これはクラウドベリージャム

translation.en: [Maret] Cloudberries are a golden berry we love to pick in the summertime.
translation.ja: クラウドベリーは夏(なつ)にとれる金色(きんいろ)の実(み)よ

translation.en: -We have made a gift for you. -[murmurs]
translation.ja: プレゼントがあるの

translation.en: Mochi! We gotta get back to Waffles and Freezie Day!
translation.ja: モチ　早くもどらなきゃ

translation.en: Wait! Before you go, I have made some of my cloudberry jam for you.
translation.ja: クラウドベリージャムをもっていって

translation.en: Let's let Waffles know the good news!
translation.ja: ワッフルに連絡(れんらく)だ

translation.en: Wow, Moch, you got cloudberry jam in Norway?
translation.ja: ノルウェーのジャム？

translation.en: -[murmurs] -Yay, you saved our holiday!
translation.ja: たすかった！

translation.en: When will you be home? The sun is gonna set any minute now.
translation.ja: 太陽(たいよう)がしずんじゃう

translation.en: We need to serve Freezie Day dinner before the sun goes down.
translation.ja: あかるいうちにもどってきて

translation.en: We're on our way, Waffles! Nothing can stop us now.
translation.ja: 大いそぎで かえるね

translation.en: Just gotta get through this tiny blizzard up ahead, and then we're cool.
translation.ja: ふぶきだって ひとっとびさ

translation.en: -[murmurs] -Did you say tiny blizzard?
translation.ja: ふぶき？

translation.en: Yeah, but it's nothing ol' Magicart can't handle!
translation.ja: うん　でもボクなら…

translation.en: [Magicart screams] Look out!
translation.ja: つかまって！

translation.en: [Magicart screams] Look out!
translation.ja: あぶない！

translation.en: Mochi, Magicart, are you there?
translation.ja: モチ　マジックカート？

translation.en: -[Magicart] Look out! -[both scream]
translation.ja: ぶつかる！

translation.en: Oh no. No, no, no. The sun.
translation.ja: やだ　太陽(たいよう)がしずんじゃう

translation.en: Oh no.
translation.ja: たいへん

translation.en: Oh no, Mochi, the sun went down! We failed! [cries]
translation.ja: 太陽(たいよう)がしずんだわしっぱいよ

translation.en: You doing okay?
translation.ja: どうかした？

translation.en: Of course. Don't I look like I'm okay?
translation.ja: へいきよ　なんでもないの

translation.en: To be honest, no, not really.
translation.ja: なんでもない顔(かお)じゃないわ

translation.en: Baker,
translation.ja: ベーカー

translation.en: can I tell you something?
translation.ja: 話(はな)していい？

translation.en: Yeah, always.
translation.ja: ええ　もちろん

translation.en: Freezie Day isn't real.
translation.ja: フリージーデーはウソなの

translation.en: Mochi and I made it up. The truth is we have no holiday, no food,
translation.ja: お祝(いわ)いの日じゃないしごちそうもない

translation.en: and now Mochi and Magicart are caught in a blizzard. [squeals]
translation.ja: しかも モチがふぶきに

translation.en: Come here.
translation.ja: おいで

translation.en: -[cries] -Come here. I know. Come here.
translation.ja: だいじょうぶよ

translation.en: -It's time you told everyone the truth. -[sniffles]
translation.ja: みんなに本当(ほんとう)のことを話(はな)して

translation.en: We did make it! We survived!
translation.ja: やった　生きてるぞ

translation.en: What in the… Something's coming up beside us.
translation.ja: なんだ？となりに だれかいる

translation.en: And then you, Samin, you were so excited. Then the Pupcakes came and they were all over the place.
translation.ja: サミンも たのしそうでワンケーキもきてくれた

translation.en: And one thing led to another and… There is no Freezie Day!
translation.ja: でも本当(ほんとう)はフリージーデーはウソなの

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: えっ？

translation.en: Wait, so am I not really here?
translation.ja: オレが見える？

translation.en: Is this a dream? Am I in a simulation?
translation.ja: これは ゆめなのか？

translation.en: [all] Mochi!
translation.ja: モチ！

translation.en: Oh, Mochi, so glad you're back safe.
translation.ja: モチ　ぶじでよかった

translation.en: But the jig is up. They know Freezie Day isn't real.
translation.ja: ウソだってことみんなに話(はな)したよ

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.ja: まあ

translation.en: So the holidays aren't just about food.
translation.ja: お祝(いわ)いはごちそうだけじゃない

translation.en: -Exactly. -Yeah.
translation.ja: そうよ

translation.en: They're about, you know, being with family and friends.
translation.ja: かぞくや ともだちといっしょに

translation.en: And singing songs and playing games.
translation.ja: うたったりゲームをしたりする

translation.en: And more than that, they're about the universal traditions that have been bringing humans together since the dawn of time.
translation.ja: 大むかしからお祝(いわ)いの日には人があつまる

translation.en: But also, there's food, right? [laughs]
translation.ja: ごちそうもね！

translation.en: Well, the sun went down though.
translation.ja: でも夜(よる)になっちゃった

translation.en: You know, not to bring up my super cool holiday again,
translation.ja: わたしの国(くに)のヤルダーというお祝(いわ)いは

translation.en: but Yalda actually starts after the sun goes down.
translation.ja: わたしの国(くに)のヤルダーというお祝(いわ)いは 夜(よる)になってから はじまるの

translation.en: -[gasps] -And it goes all night long.
translation.ja: そして 夜中(よなか)までつづく

translation.en: All night long?
translation.ja: 夜中(よなか)まで？

translation.en: Moch, do you know what this means?
translation.ja: モチ よかったね

translation.en: Freezie Day can still happen!
translation.ja: お祝(いわ)いできる

translation.en: Hit it, Tracee.
translation.ja: はじめて　トレイシー

translation.en: -♪ Today's the day ♪ -Oh.
translation.ja: お祝(いわ)いの日

translation.en: ♪ We celebrate with all our friends And eat real late ♪
translation.ja: ともだちと　　夜(よる)までたべよう

translation.en: [all] ♪ It's Freezie Day ♪
translation.ja: フリージーデー

translation.en: ♪ And we will cook a traditional feast ♪
translation.ja: みんなで伝統料理(でんとうりょうり)をつくろう

translation.en: [Steve] ♪ We'll whisk and chop And use other techniques! ♪
translation.ja: あわ立てたり きざんだり

translation.en: [all] ♪ It's Freezie Day ♪
translation.ja: フリージーデー

translation.en: Mochi, look! Freezie Day is real.
translation.ja: 本物(ほんもの)のお祝(いわ)いになったね

translation.en: We made our own holiday tradition.
translation.ja: 伝統(でんとう)をつくったんだよ

translation.en: We're singing, we're cooking, and we're up way past our bedtime.
translation.ja: うたって 料理(りょうり)して夜(よる)まで たのしむの

translation.en: Who wants snow cones?
translation.ja: かきごおりは？

translation.en: [all] Me!
translation.ja: たべる！

translation.en: ♪ A special time to be together ♪
translation.ja: とくべつな季節(きせつ)

translation.en: ♪ You can feel the magic in the air ♪
translation.ja: まほうが かかったみたい

translation.en: ♪ See the smiles around the table ♪
translation.ja: テーブルには　　笑顔(えがお)がいっぱい

translation.en: ♪ A time to give and a time to share ♪
translation.ja: やさしさを わかちあおう

translation.en: ♪ There's traditions we observe ♪ ♪ Like sweet jam we preserved ♪
translation.ja: あまいジャムのような　　伝統料理(でんとうりょうり)でお祝(いわ)いして

translation.en: ♪ And there's my favorite treat That I love to serve ♪
translation.ja: デザートも つくってあげる

translation.en: ♪ A berry-topped snow cone ♪ ♪ And that's where we'll begin ♪
translation.ja: まずはジャムの かきごおり

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, everything tastes better ♪ ♪ When you're with your friends ♪
translation.ja: ともだちといれば　　すべてが おいしい

translation.en: [all] ♪ Today's the day ♪
translation.ja: お祝(いわ)いの日

translation.en: ♪ We celebrate With hearts as full as dinner plates ♪
translation.ja: 料理(りょうり)みたいに　　心(こころ)も あたたかい

translation.en: ♪ It's Freezie Day ♪
translation.ja: フリージーデー

translation.en: ♪ We sing and laugh ♪ ♪ There's lots to eat ♪ ♪ We'll have leftovers for weeks ♪
translation.ja: うたって わらって　　たくさん たべよう

translation.en: ♪ It's Freezie Day ♪
translation.ja: フリージーデー

translation.en: ♪ Today's the day ♪
translation.ja: お祝(いわ)いの日

translation.en: ♪ We celebrate With hearts as full as dinner plates ♪
translation.ja: 料理(りょうり)みたいに　　心(こころ)も あたたかい

translation.en: ♪ It's Freezie Day ♪
translation.ja: フリージーデー

translation.en: ♪ We sing and laugh ♪ ♪ There's lots to eat ♪ ♪ We'll have leftovers for weeks ♪
translation.ja: うたって わらって　　たくさん たべよう

translation.en: ♪ It's Freezie Day ♪
translation.ja: フリージーデー

translation.en: ♪ Today's the day ♪
translation.ja: お祝(いわ)いの日

translation.en: ♪ We celebrate With hearts as full as dinner plates ♪
translation.ja: 料理(りょうり)みたいに　　心(こころ)も あたたかい

translation.en: ♪ It's Freezie Day ♪
translation.ja: フリージーデー

translation.en: ♪ We sing and laugh ♪ ♪ There's lots to eat We'll have leftovers for weeks ♪
translation.ja: うたって わらって　　たくさん たべよう

translation.en: -♪ It's Freezie Day ♪ -♪ Oh, it's Freezie Day ♪
translation.ja: フリージーデー

translation.en: I hope they ask us to clean up!
translation.ja: そうじは まかせてよ

translation.en: [all] ♪ Freezie Day ♪
translation.ja: フリージーデー

translation.en: Until next Freezie Day, everyone! See you next year!
translation.ja: 来年(らいねん)のフリージーデーにまた あおうね！
